blocks.caption: Problem on Stonem Column.
blocks.description: The figure shows the curve for the diameter of a tapering stone column along with its weight. It represents the relationship between the diameter measurements at different heights and their corresponding weights per cubic foot, illustrating the volume and weight distribution of the column.
